1.Title: Lord of Seas
1.Description: Increases <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> by <color=#2BAD00>25%</color>. Upon hitting an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>, the equipper`s CRIT Rate increases by <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 8s. When dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> with a <color=#FFFFFF>Dash Attack</color>, the equipper`s CRIT Rate increases by an additional <color=#2BAD00>10%</color> for 15s. The duration of each effect is calculated separately.
